channel.title: Music Features on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Debbie Gibson Talks Jet-Setting Dinner With George Michael, Meeting Princess Diana and Being “Hijacked” by Lyme Disease
item.description: The singer opens up about her career and her new memoir, “Eternally Electric.”

item.title: What Do Charlie Kirk’s Killing and ‘Money Heist’ Have in Common? “Bella Ciao”
item.description: The anti-fascism anthem, seemingly referenced on a bullet casing found at the assassination scene, was also prominently featured in Netflix’s 2017 Spanish crime series.

item.title: Stella Cole Wants You to Escape With Her While Listening to Her New Album
item.description: The singer, who just dropped her third album, ‘It’s Magic,’ is introducing younger generations to a timeless genre of music with her interpretations of 20th-century American jazz and show tunes.

item.title: Stella Cole Wants You to Escape With Her While Listening to Her New Album
item.description: The singer, who just dropped her third album, ‘It’s Magic,’ is introducing younger generations to a timeless genre of music with her interpretations of 20th-century American jazz and show tunes.

item.title: Oasis Just Glitched the Algorithm
item.description: Unruly, undigital, and fiercely communal — the Gallagher Bros.’ U.S. swing is everything our techno-entertainment world isn’t. Which is exactly why we need them.
